Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Andante in F major, KV 616

1791 · KV1,2,3,6 616

[IMSLP]

This piece is for mechanical organ, written over three staves, but can be played effectively on the piano. This is not the case for the remainder of Mozart’s music for mechanical organ: the adagio and allegro in F minor (KV 594), the allegro and andante (fantasie) in F minor (KV 608), and the incomplete adagio in D minor (Anh. 35/593a).

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/2 · BA 4584-02 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Einzelstücke · ed. Wolfgang Plath [written on three staves]
  • Associated Board · Mature Piano Pieces · ed. Richard Jones
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 133 · Klavierstücke / Auswahl · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 232 · ed. Bertha Antonia Wallner
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50230 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Spätere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger

Duration: 7'

Difficulty: 3.5
